short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create and design a personal workspace in your browser start tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replace your new tab page with a completely customizable dashboard containing news, tasks, bookmarks, and more! 

Only Dashboi lets you completely customize the look and feel of your new tab page by giving you the flexibility to arrange your components, change your background photo, and style the page to make it feel like your own.

Free features
• News feeds from the most popular news sources (CNN, Fox, The Guardian, and more!)
• Tasks
• Bookmarks
• Stock and crypto tickers & charts
• Customizable background photo
• Welcome messages
• Google search
• Clock

Promotional background images courtesy of Marie-Michèle Bouchard (https://unsplash.com/@minusculemarie) and Jan Starek (https://unsplash.com/@janstarek)
